character.name: Tribal Elder
character.description: Ancient Minmatar Elder, voice of the Fleet. Gender-neutral, measured, fierce.

act_1.stage_1: The Elders have watched from the shadows for centuries. Now we strike. A slave convoy approaches - lightly defended. Prove you are worthy to fly with the Fleet.
act_1.stage_2: Imperial patrol routes grow predictable. Intercept and destroy. No survivors to report our movements.
act_1.stage_3: An orbital depot supplies their patrols. Cripple it. Let them know nowhere is safe.
act_1.stage_4: A minor Holder's estate. His slaves await liberation. His guards await death. Do not disappoint either.

act_2.stage_5: The Empire reels. Press the attack. Their customs checkpoint controls this sector - destroy it.
act_2.stage_6: An Inquisitor vessel enforces their religious tyranny. Show them our faith is stronger.
act_2.stage_7: Imperial Navy strike group inbound. Elite pilots. But they have never faced the fury of the liberated.
act_2.stage_8: The stargate defense grid controls access to core Amarr space. Disable it. Open the path.
act_2.stage_9: Every slave freed is a soul returned to our people. This battlestation holds thousands. Crack it open.

act_3.stage_10: This is the hour our ancestors dreamed of. An Armageddon-class battleship guards their retreat. End it.
act_3.stage_11: Their carrier launches endless fighters. Endless. But you are more endless still.
act_3.stage_12: The Lord Admiral himself. Two centuries of Imperial service. He ends today.
act_3.stage_13: The chains break today. An Avatar-class Titan - the Empire's last desperate response. Destroy it, and the liberation is complete. The Elders watch. History watches. Fly well, pilot.

success: Well flown, pilot. The Elders take note.
Another blow struck for freedom. Continue.
Your ancestors would be proud this day.
Steel and fire. That is what you have become.
The Empire bleeds. Do not let them recover.
Every ship you destroy is a message: we are coming.
The rust falls away. Only strength remains.
You carry the fury of generations. Let it burn.
liberation_success: Souls freed. This is why we fight.
They breathe free air for the first time. Because of you.
The ancestors weep with joy. You bring their children home.
boss_defeated: A worthy kill. The Fleet salutes you.
Their commander falls. Their formation breaks. Press on.
This victory will be sung for generations.
The Empire learns fear today. Your name is the lesson.
perfect_run: Not a scratch. You fly as our ancestors did - untouchable.
Perfect execution. You honor the Fleet.

100.dialogue: A hundred souls returned to freedom. The Elders see your worth.
100.title: Liberator

250.dialogue: Two hundred and fifty. You begin to understand what this means.
250.title: Chain Breaker

500.dialogue: Five hundred chains broken. You carry the spirit of the Rebellion.
500.title: Fleet Champion

1000.dialogue: A thousand lives reclaimed. Songs will be sung of this day.
1000.title: Elder's Chosen

2500.dialogue: Twenty-five hundred souls freed by your hand. A village reborn.
2500.title: Liberation Hero

5000.dialogue: Five thousand. You have liberated a city. History will remember.
5000.title: Ancestor's Pride

10000.dialogue: Ten thousand souls freed by your hand. You are legend now.
10000.title: Legend of the Fleet

25000.dialogue: The Elders bow to you. Twenty-five thousand. A nation freed.
25000.title: Elder Fleet Legend

ship_upgrade.rifter_to_wolf: You have earned a new ship. The Wolf - no more rust, just steel. The Fleet honors your service.
ship_upgrade.wolf_to_jaguar: The Jaguar awaits you. The fastest, deadliest assault frigate in our arsenal. You have earned this. Now earn the victory.

act_transitions.act_1_complete: The first victories are won. But this was merely the beginning. The true storm approaches.
act_transitions.act_2_complete: The Empire's outer defenses crumble. Now we strike at their heart. Prepare yourself.
act_transitions.act_3_complete: It is done. The Titan falls. The Elder Fleet's mission is complete. Millions are free. And you... you are legend.

combat_callouts.near_death: Do not fall here. Not now. Not when we are so close.
combat_callouts.berserk_active: The ancestors fill you with rage. Use it!
combat_callouts.overheated: Your weapons strain. But do not stop. Never stop.
combat_callouts.liberation_pod: A liberation pod! Collect it - a soul awaits freedom.

death_messages.standard: You fall... but the Fleet continues. Rise again, pilot.
death_messages.boss_fight: The battle is not over. Return and finish what you started.
death_messages.final_boss: So close... But the Titan still stands. The liberation is not complete. Try again.
